parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post contains a CMF number: "CMF: 11240027". This strongly suggests electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions "Partidul S.O.S. România" (SOS party) and its position on the ballot (#9) and promotes voting for them in the parliamentary elections. It also mentions Celin Georgescu, but in the context of the presidential elections, which is not the focus of the analysis.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The message is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support the SOS party in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Votăm Partidul S.O.S. România la Parlamentare") is a clear indication of this intent.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective information or analysis but rather promoting a specific political party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement of a political party and a call to action to vote for them.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>594468426393957</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific candidate (SOS party), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact end date is not specified, the post's date suggests it might be after the end of the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for SOS), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The fact that it's a paid Facebook advertisement targeting a wide audience reinforces its propagandistic nature.  While it mentions a presidential candidate, the primary focus and call to action are clearly directed towards the parliamentary elections.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul S.O.S. România</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>ALVERNA CONNECT SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ALVERNA CONNECT SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 594468426393957) cu conținut electoral, care promovează Partidul S.O.S. România pentru alegerile parlamentare,  indicând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot (#9) și îndemnând la vot ("Votăm Partidul S.O.S. România la Parlamentare").  Prezența CMF-ului 11240027 confirmă natura electorală a postării, iar caracterul plătit al acesteia, pe o platformă publică precum Facebook, demonstrează intenția de a influența votul unui număr mare de persoane.  Postarea, prin urmare, constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, încălcând prevederile legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
